name: Kofi Egwu
story: Kofi grew up in a small village in Ghana. He moved to the city when he was 18 to study business. After completing his degree, he married his sweetheart and settled down to start a family. Kofi has always been known for his ability to connect with people and his charismatic personality. Despite being a civilian, he is well-respected by members of the armed forces as well as his fellow civilians.
